name: position-sizing-action-space
description: Position sizing action space (v2.7.0): 7 actions (HOLD + 3 BUY sizes + 3 SELL sizes) with account simulation. Trigger when: (1) model needs to learn position sizing, (2) training for small accounts, (3) obs_dim changes from 5600 to 5900, (4) 56 to 59 feature upgrade.
